faction_info.name: Tyranids
faction_info.description: The Great Devourer, an alien swarm controlled by a collective Hive Mind.

faction_rules.name: Objectives
faction_rules.effect: Tyranid armies cannot score Victory Points from holding Objective counters. Instead: 1 VP for each detachment destroyed. 1 VP for each quadrant of the playing field not occupied by enemy forces each turn.

faction_rules.name: The Hive Mind
faction_rules.effect: One Synapse Creature must be taken for every 3 Core Broods chosen. Bio-Titans and Flyers do not count toward this limit.

faction_rules.name: Brood
faction_rules.effect: The term 'Brood' is used instead of 'Detachment' but has the exact same meaning.

faction_rules.name: Mycetic Spore Assault
faction_rules.effect: All broods must be carried in Mycetic Spores if they do not have the Deep Strike, Infiltrate or Flyer special rules. In addition to this, the player may choose to deploy Deep Strike broods from turn one.

faction_rules.name: Late Stage Invasion
faction_rules.effect: All units in this formation re-roll failed Morale checks.

rampage.name: Rampage
rampage.description: Move at double rate towards nearest enemy. Must fight if in contact. Moves around impassable terrain via shortest path.

hunt.name: Hunt
hunt.description: Move normal rate towards nearest enemy not in combat. Will engage if possible. If not pinned, shoots at nearest enemy in Advance Fire segment.

nest.name: Nest
nest.description: Will not move. Shoots at nearest enemy in First Fire segment.

psychic_scream.name: Psychic Scream
psychic_scream.effect: First Fire phase. Morale check (caster). If passed, all units within 8" must take Morale test; if failed, they Fall Back.

catalyst.name: Catalyst
catalyst.effect: Combat phase. Morale check (caster). If passed, a single brood within 8" gains Feel No Pain.

the_horror.name: The Horror
the_horror.effect: Before rolling engagement die. Morale check (caster). If passed, enemy rolls one extra die but discards the highest (CAF applies as normal).

synaptic_swarm.name: Synaptic Swarm
synaptic_swarm.flavor: The archetypical swarm linked to the Hive Mind.
rules: The Hive Mind: One Synapse Creature must be taken for every 3 Core Broods.

assault_swarm.name: Assault Swarm
assault_swarm.flavor: Waves of Mycetic Spores launched from orbit.
rules: The Hive Mind: Even though Tyranid Swarms vary greatly, they always have a number of synapse creatures that further the will of the Hive Mind. To represent this, one Synapse Creature must be taken for every 3 Core Broods you choose.

Mycetic Spore Assault: All broods must be carried in Mycetic Spores if they do not have the Deep Strike, Infiltrate or Flyer special rules. In addition to this, the player may choose to deploy Deep Strike broods from turn one.

bio_titan_swarm.name: Bio-Titan Swarm
bio_titan_swarm.flavor: Late stage invasion with massive bio-constructs.
rules: Late Stage Invasion: All units in this formation re-roll failed Morale checks.

special_rules_library.synapse: Aura effect (X inches). Units within range auto-pass Morale checks (except Psychic tests).
special_rules_library.instinct: Take Morale check at end of Initiative Phase. If failed, unit receives the specified order (Rampage, Hunt, Nest).
special_rules_library.regeneration: When reduced to 0 wounds, do not remove. In End Phase, if not wiped out, roll D6 per wound lost; 6+ restores 1 wound.
special_rules_library.chameleon_skin: Cannot be targeted by enemy units engaged outside of X inches.
special_rules_library.winged: Can partake in close combat even if they have Flyer rule.
special_rules_library.burrow: Instead of moving, return to reserves to Deep Strike in later turns.
special_rules_library.spawn: End Phase. Spawn Y units of type X. Added to brood if same type, else form new brood. Placed close to spawner.
special_rules_library.miasma: Shooting attacks against this unit suffer -1 To Hit. Enemies engaged with this unit suffer -1 CAF.

weapon_traits_library.attract: If target not killed, move closest model D6" towards attacker. Can cause Engagement. Ignored by Void/Ion Shields.
weapon_traits_library.hunger: When enemy slain, attacker regains 1 wound (up to max).
weapon_traits_library.beam: Trace straight line to target. All formations under line are hit.
weapon_traits_library.parry: In Close Combat, force opponent to re-roll one die.
weapon_traits_library.spore_launcher: Target closest model in detachment. Roll 2D6 + scatter. If hit, detonates as Spore Mine. Spore Mines: Moves randomly D6" in End Phase. Detonates on contact with non-Tyranid or impassable. Blast (3"), AP -1, Light AT.
weapon_traits_library.spore_mine: Moves randomly D6" in End Phase. Detonates on contact with non-Tyranid or impassable. Blast (3"), AP -1, Light AT.

upgrades.name: Replace Scything Talons with Bone Swords (per model)
Replace Death Spitter with Barbed Strangler (1 per 3 models)
Replace Death Spitter with Venom Cannon (1 per 3 models)
Replace Bio-Plasma with Barbed Strangler (per model)
Replace Bio-Plasma with Venom Cannon (per model)
Upgrade to Pyrovores (Combat +1, Spore Mine Launcher -> Pyroacid Launcher)

ripperswarm_brood.name: Ripperswarm Brood
ripperswarm_brood.unit_note: Thousands of rippers gather for a feast and even the most devastating weapons wonâ€™t be able to eliminate them easily, like cockroaches they will reemerge from burrows in the ground.

haruspex_brood.name: Haruspex Brood
haruspex_brood.unit_note: Possessed of a rapacious appetite, driven by the need to sate an infinite hunger.
